content.question: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the differences in the approaches to church-state relations advocated by various Protestant groups in the 1500s.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that: Has a relevant thesis. Addresses all parts of the question. Supports thesis with specific evidence. Is well organized. Analyze the differences in the approaches to church-state relations advocated by various Protestant groups in the 1500s.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
